languages.text: {n}В неверном свете факелов вы замечаете блеск стали. Один из разодетых в камзолы молодых людей прижал к ребрам второго лезвие. Под ногами нападающего лежит сброшенная маска. Заметив вас, дрожащая жертва вскрикивает:{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Спасите!"

traits.locale_text: {n}В неверном свете факелов вы замечаете блеск стали. Один из разодетых в камзолы людей прижал к ребрам второго лезвие. Под ногами нападающего лежит сброшенная маска. Заметив вас, дрожащая жертва вскрикивает:{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Спасите! Ряженый свихнулся и пытается убить меня!"

languages.text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"
languages.original_text: {n}В неверном свете факелов вы замечаете блеск стали. Один из разодетых в камзолы молодых людей прижал к ребрам второго лезвие. Под ногами нападающего лежит сброшенная маска. Заметив вас, дрожащая жертва вскрикивает:{/n} "Ваша Светлость! Спасите!"

traits.locale_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

{n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at his feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Save me! This impostor has gone mad and is trying to kill me!"

{n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at his feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Save me! This impostor has gone mad and is trying to kill me!"

{n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

{n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

{n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

languages.text: {n}在摇曳的火光中，钢铁的寒光一闪而过。一名身穿夹克的年轻男子手中握着利刃，抵住了另一名男子的肋骨。袭击者脚边丢着一个面具，而那个浑身颤抖的受害者一看到你，就放声高喊起来。{/n}“大人！救救我！”
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}在摇曳的火光中，钢铁的寒光一闪而过。一名身穿夹克的年轻男子手中握着利刃，抵住了另一名男子的肋骨。袭击者脚边丢着一个面具，而那个浑身颤抖的受害者一看到你，就放声高喊起来。{/n}“大人！救救我！”

languages.text: {n}揺らめく松明の灯りの中、鋼のきらめきが視界に入った。ジャケットを着た若い男の一人が、もう一人の脇腹に刃を突きつけている。足元には、仮面が転がっていた。震えている被害者があなたに気づき、叫んだ。{/n}「閣下！お助けください！」
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}揺らめく松明の灯りの中、鋼のきらめきが視界に入った。ジャケットを着た男の一人が、もう一人の脇腹に刃を突きつけている。足元には、仮面が転がっていた。震えている被害者があなたに気づき、叫んだ。{/n}「閣下！お助けください！この偽者が正気を失って、私を殺そうとしているんです！」

languages.text: {n}Vislumbras el destello del acero a la trémula luz de las antorchas. Uno de los jóvenes enchaquetados presiona una cuchilla afilada contra las costillas del otro. Hay una máscara tirada a los pies del atacante. Cuando repara en tu presencia, la temblorosa víctima te llama a voz en grito:{/n} «¡Excelencia! ¡Sálveme!».
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vislumbras el destello del acero a la trémula luz de las antorchas. Uno de los jóvenes enchaquetados presiona una cuchilla afilada contra las costillas del otro. Hay una máscara tirada a los pies del atacante. Cuando repara en tu presencia, la temblorosa víctima te llama a voz en grito:{/n} «¡Excelencia! ¡Sálveme!».

languages.text: {n}Meşale ateşinin titrek ışığında yansıyan çeliğin parıltısı gözüne çarpıyor. Ceket giymiş genç bir adamın ceketli başka bir adamın karnına bıçak dayadığını görüyorsun. Fırlatıp atılmış bir maske, saldırganın ayak ucunda duruyor. Seni fark eden kurban çırpınıyor.{/n} "Yüce efendimiz! Kurtarın beni!"
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Meşale ateşinin titrek ışığında yansıyan çeliğin parıltısı gözüne çarpıyor. Ceket giymiş genç bir adamın ceketli başka bir adamın karnına bıçak dayadığını görüyorsun. Fırlatıp atılmış bir maske, saldırganın ayak ucunda duruyor. Seni fark eden kurban çırpınıyor.{/n} "Yüce efendimiz! Kurtarın beni!"

languages.text: {n}Vous apercevez un éclat d'acier dans la lumière vacillante des torches. L'un des jeunes hommes en veste appuie une lame contre les côtes de l'autre. Un masque gît aux pieds de l'attaquant. En vous remarquant, la victime tremblante s'écrie :{/n} « Votre Altesse ! Sauvez-moi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous apercevez un éclat d'acier dans la lumière vacillante des torches. L'un des jeunes hommes en veste appuie une lame contre les côtes de l'autre. Un masque gît aux pieds de l'attaquant. En vous remarquant, la victime tremblante s'écrie :{/n} « Votre Altesse ! Sauvez-moi ! »

languages.text: {n}Im flackernden Licht blitzt Stahl auf. Einer der jungen Männer presst eine Klinge gegen die Rippen des anderen. Zu seinen Füßen liegt eine Maske. Als das zitternde Opfer dich bemerkt, ruft es:{/n} "Eure Hoheit! Rettet mich!"
languages.original_text: {n}In the wavering torchlight, you see a glint of steel. One of the jacket-clad young men is pressing a blade against the other's ribs. A mask lies discarded at the attacker's feet. Noticing you, the trembling victim cries out,{/n} "Your Highness! Save me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Im flackernden Licht blitzt Stahl auf. Einer der jungen Männer presst eine Klinge gegen die Rippen des anderen. Zu seinen Füßen liegt eine Maske. Als das zitternde Opfer dich bemerkt, ruft es:{/n} "Eure Hoheit! Rettet mich!"
